name: worker-integrated-test
description: A sample Cloudflare worker demonstrating tests with Jest and Wrangler

scripts.test: concurrently --timings --success first --kill-others "wrangler dev --local dist/index.js" "wait-on -d 3000 -t 10000 http-get://127.0.0.1:8787 && node node_modules/.bin/jest --coverage --ci --runInBand --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit"

author: Paolo Tagliaferri <me@paolotagliaferri.com>
